title: Cornish Pasties
ingredients: ['2 small carrots', '275g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '100g butter, diced', '100ml water', '600g rump steak, cubed', '1 onion, chopped', '2 potatoes, peeled and diced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons milk']
